content: liminary question, Medusa, stone, flange, pierre d‚Äôangle et d‚Äôattente (cornerstone, toothing stone) > other enumeration, squarely written, remains in reserve, undecipherable

Soller‚Äôs Numbers is exemplary re: the reader, cette fois enfin, the text shows (montr√©e) that a reader cannot choose his/her place in a text > does so by composing surfaces retourn√©es & par une mise en sc√®ne mat√©rielle exacte
Littr√©: d√©clenchement, triggering a machine, release of a machine, lever la clenche, open a door, speak

in Soller‚Äôs Numbers, cette fois enfin, ‚Äúcette fois enfin‚Äù not an accomplishment w/ single blow of the pen or the die (d‚Äô√©criture ou de d√©s): nothing could be more foreign to eschatology (of or by way of literature) than Soller‚Äôs finite-infinite seriation (encha√Ænement) of numbers
in Soller‚Äôs Numbers, since ‚Äúas such‚Äù is no longer in control, the exhibited functions of text are not montr√©e but mont√©e (not displayed but put in play, not staged but engaged‚Ä¶)
in Soller‚Äôs Numbers, only 1/ 4 surfaces donnant lieu to moment of visibility, de la pr√©sence en vis-√†-vis (face-to-face), counting out the phenomenon > surface is mounted (mont√©e)
event that begins by repeating itself: such event takes the form of a r√©cit
no one can enter Soller‚Äôs Numbers who thinks literature/thought ought to exorcise the machine (that the 2 have nothing to do w/ each other)

technicity as metaphor that transports life into death, a non-accidental extra, which, in its act of falling (en y tombant): la branche (plugs it in) et la d√©clenche (and triggers it off): ‚Äúforce vivante‚Äù
Soller: beating envelope, I was on its border
Mallarm√©: mime sets up pure medium of fiction, perpetual allusion (in a hymen)

[let‚Äôs mark in hollow, mute, invisible angle] statistical accumulation of ‚Äúquotations,‚Äù [like constraints of that angle] accumulation as feigning to present the text > ‚Äúthis‚Äù text & all that touches it‚Äîstill ‚Äúthat‚Äù text; generalized simulacrum: intertext of 2 fictions (btwn primary text & commentary) [Derrida will call D ‚Äúthis‚Äù text w/ a certain irony]
open system: repetition of ruptures

Derrida‚Äôs text: re-marks passage [in Soller‚Äôs], repeats square by closing angle, opens another surface of writing to-come: play w/ cardo, hinge, cardinal points; remarque d‚Äôangle: all lines broken

passage toward other, se resserrer (fitting itself) into the angles btwn the surfaces, dans l‚Äôentre-surface [inter(sur)face] > articulation of one surface sur l‚Äôautre (d‚Äôun temps sur l‚Äôautre) ‚Äî‚Äîangle: night, blue passage of all tenses into each other, la torsion (twist)
re: Soller‚Äôs Numbers, a praxis that doesn‚Äôt just produce (not governed by motif of truth whose very horizon it frames), a certain textual zero

structural transcendental illusion, one surface of Soller‚Äôs square opens to ‚Äúclassical representative scene‚Äù > this is a necessity, no nonplace left out, so no pure origin can stand guard over stage as if derived from intactness of absolute opening: any attempt to return to l‚Äôintimit√© indemne et propre played out in illusion > nothing takes place but place

motif.title: UNSCATHED / SAFE / SACRED / GUARD / SECURITY / KEEP

content: ‚Äúsquare mouth‚Äù ‚Äîsquare horizontality of page, cadre, frame‚Äîsquared opening

illusion of truth facing me, sans cesse par soi r√©g√©n√©r√©e de mon visage, will have only been scene-effect of ‚Äúdispositif‚Äù; cet appareil differentiated enough to include autarchic illusion of sovereign subject in its structure
‚ÄúI‚Äù w/ only illusion of mastery, decided by a throw of dice: law of chance

by a folding-back (reploiement) or internal angle of surface: face (frons scaenae) contemplates itself as unconditioned opening of appearance, but explains itself as surface-effect, as conditioned [by square apparatus]
every term depends on place [in?] machine‚Äîentrained into an ordered series of cuts
Soller: toujours cette marge, cette coupure, mince immensit√© latente

violent, arbitrary cut, scission (la coupure) necessary because beginning se plie et se multiplie; coupe-papier (letter-opener), la lame (sharp blade) de la d√©cision, tranchant (cutting edge); la r√©p√©tition hasardeuse et n√©cessaire du d√©j√†-l√† d‚Äôun (autre) texte

knife, obsessive, phallus that threatens & is threatened, la menace du coupe-papier dont saigna la tranche rouge ouvre ou √©rige (which the red edge bled opens or erects), thus broaching/breaching (entamant) in a stroke (d‚Äôun trait) the decision: opens mouth > operation of reading/writing
to present oneself, to stand upright (se dresser), always a murder, a castration > an erection that can only display itself in play, laughter, pointed teeth of cut
Sollers: ‚Äúwe are dancing on a volcano‚Äù
pure present: la pl√©nitude inentam√©e, la continuit√© vierge de la non-coupure (not yet having been written, √† la veille du jeu)
laughter: the cut, display teeth

present can only present itself by relating back to itself [folding back on itself], (com)plying with itself (en se pliant √† soi) dans l‚Äôangle, along la brisure: a ‚Äúcrack (faille)‚Äù created by a joint, hinge
life & presence as privileged examples [of folding back onto their own limit, folding back in their very triggering] > inscribes difference in heart of life
possibility (potency) of present is its own limit, inner fold, impossibility‚Äîits impotence (btwn presence/castration) > same goes for ‚Äúhistory,‚Äù ‚Äúform‚Äù: language of metaphysics
‚Äúpresent‚Äù only marked in citation, storytelling, fiction
numerical multiplicity not death threat sneaking up on unified germ, it pathbreaks (fraye la voie) for ‚Äúthe‚Äù seed (semence), which advances/produces (itself) in plural: singular plural

each germ is its own term‚Äîfinds its term w/in itself as its own internal limit, faisant angle avec sa proper mort [tracing, grafting, semen already swarming (essaim√©e)] ‚Äî‚Äîatomistic theories, theories of germ
dissemination, germination, no first insemination, ‚Äúprimal‚Äù insemination is dissemination: a trace, graft, whose traces have been lost
mathematicogenetic theory of groups: [if this were intended to mean anything] nothing prior to group (no originary unity prior to division)

‚Äúprimitive‚Äù mythical unity always reconstituted retrospectively dans l‚Äôapr√®s-coupure > the decision, le coup (shot, throw, blow) parts the seed as it projects it (partage la semence en la projetant)

proliferation, substitution of the unit that adds & effaces itself, counts itself out (se d√©comptant) at moment of d√©clenchement; Sollers: ‚Äúparticipating in the calculation that effaced us and replaced us‚Äù
opening of presence, ‚Äúdead surface,‚Äù 4th surface, plunged by its ‚Äúhistory‚Äù into limitless time that is neither ‚Äúpresent‚Äù nor a ‚Äúhistory‚Äù
nothing says present better, it seems, than il y a; but what is present is a scission, il y a cette coupure, what is present & at work is a ‚Äúrecoil (recul),‚Äù possibility of its triggering
presence as product, tombe d√©j√† comme un effet, sous le coup (under the sway) d‚Äôune structure machin√©e qui ne se livre (gives itself away) pas au pr√©sent
double bottom, ‚Äútheaters of memory,‚Äù deprives square of ground (suspended in air)
such future perfect makes one text circulate in another, excludes eschatology > future perfect of innumerable imperfect, indefinite past that will never have been present
to describe a continuity of ruptures that doesn‚Äôt flatten along homogenous surface (present), necessary to turn to what's outside our language
this [re: Numbers] reinscription (writing, a machination) takes place (a lieu), il y a sa violence
‚Äúwe,‚Äù nonpersonal, limitless, imperfect: I, you, he cut out of a ‚Äúwe‚Äù never presented full face (de face)
Soller‚Äôs open square: open side, air, mirror, veil
Soller: single sheet gives sensation of depth, representation, reflection
l‚Äô√©criT, l‚Äô√©crAn, l‚Äô√©crIN (wriTing, encAsIng, screeNing): TAIN
the opening, as presence, is not noticed as opening‚Äîwe‚Äôre fascinated, glued to what presents itself: we‚Äôre unable to see presence as such, visibility of visible > never present themselves
once ether (presence of present) has been called to mind: plupresent not merely presence but deformation irreducible to any form (presence, first matter in the last instance)
mercury, tain of this ink: a screen: visible projection surface for images, & prevents one from seeing other side
not enough to make air itself appear (call presence to mind), ‚Äúair‚Äù is not a simple medium: opening carved out of it is a closed opening, false exit: a mirror‚Äînot any mirror, the tain of‚Ä¶
don‚Äôt dispel the uncertainty: whether mirror is classical stage or generalized space in which old theater is inscribed?
all oppositions sont d√©traqu√©es (thrown out of whack) by ‚Äúavoir-lieu‚Äù of mirror: each term takes over (capte) the other & excludes itself from itself
mirror takes place as something designed to be broken
the inside of text will always have been outside it; reciprocal contamination of body proper, violent expatriation, poison affirmed‚Äîmercury in its tain is a poison
tout ‚Äúcommence‚Äù donc par la citation, dans les faux plis (creases) d‚Äôun certain voile, of a certain mirror-like screen
l‚Äô√©l√©ment enveloppe et se d√©compte (deducts itself) de ce qu‚Äôil enveloppe
each part of mirror larger than whole (mirror smaller than itself): 4th surface paradigm of this relation
to try to resist removal of textual member from context‚Äîmaintain boundary line btwn inside/outside of context > classical limits: remain protected against writing poison
fertility of mother-site (androgynous), M (male, m√®re), m/f, milk, milky way, m√®re, √©num√®re
sign becomes what it is only through possibility of its reissue (sa r√©√©dition)
through mirror-effect (germinates/deforms), each sequence of text comprehends another > each part smaller than themselves & greater than the whole they reflect

figure of quadrangle complicated by strange mirror [imparfait de double fond], mirror as echo that precedes origin it seems to answer > ‚Äúecho‚Äù is an ‚Äúincision‚Äù (X n‚Äô√©tant constitu√©s qu‚Äôen retour)
‚ÄúI‚Äù as ghost, as germ, term, that disseminates, a germ that carries w/in itself its own term, se faisant fort de sa mort > le sperme: ferme
re: Soller‚Äôs Numbers, Plato‚Äôs cave contained in an incommensurably, impr√©visiblement, more complicated machine

le discurs d‚Äôassistance, pluperfect, deconstructs ‚Äúillusion‚Äù of present, unites presence & auxiliary, supports [Plato‚Äôs boetheia] ekgonos (dispossessed son), a seed exposed to all violence of writing: you [baby daddy]
‚ÄúI‚Äù that attends its own incessant, violent reinscription, a pure passageway for operations of substitution, a mere function or ghost
what does it mean to stand upright (se dresser) if inconsistent, divided?
‚ÄúI‚Äù: passing passageway for permutation, repercussive percussion, full force of writing > d‚Äôun coup, triggers (d√©clenche) tale & keeps (maintient) it in progress
simulacrum [of ‚ÄúI‚Äù] as a force, le simulacre de l‚Äôassistance: chambre obscure: feigns to transform the imperfect into present: impossible > et vous entra√Æne dans un nouveau vertige
a summons, provocation, face-to-face [w/ what?]

‚ÄúI‚Äù as surface vacant of itself: foments (prepares a poison) cruel dispossession > reaches simulacrum point: o√π il peut √† la fois teindre le tissu (stains the tissue) et feindre to tell you truth about it

s‚Äôil n‚Äôy a pas de hors-texte [outside the text, extratext], it‚Äôs because le graphique g√©n√©ralis√© a toujours d√©j√† commenc√©: il n‚Äôy a rien avant le texte, always implanted in ‚Äúprior‚Äù writing [no pretext that‚Äôs not already text]
[parentheses: no outside text]
authority & property still remain, but as pretensions of attending discourse, dead surface effects
imperfect, certain aorist, certain unlimitedness, ‚Äúunreachable double bottom (double-fond insaisissable)‚Äù: past of an anterior future, future of an anterior past
two is no more an accident of one than one is a secondary surplus of zero (or vice versa): reconsider notion of accident, secondariness, surplus

content: one‚Äôs undifferentiated proximity to oneself: another name for death > the space of property: ‚Äúdead surface‚Äù
trace can only imprint itself by referring to another trace (the other), letting itself be upstaged (outrepasser)/forgotten: its force of production stands in relation to energy of its erasure
[re: melody in Numbers] in all senses of word, it‚Äôs a cadence you must follow
authorless voice, phonic tracing no ideal signified could stamp [sa frappe sensible] sans reste, all representative outcroppings (affleurements) subjected to rhythm of a numerous pounding
Verlaine was told: text speaking of itself, w/out an author
for Plato, Delta (ùö´) most perfect letter [equilateral triangle]
in Soller‚Äôs Numbers, you are indefinitely referred to bottomlessness, indefinite regress of beginning, which is forbidden along w/ eschatology, archeology, hermeneutic teleology
expropriation is operation w/in voice
cited text, prior past still to come
opening paradoxically wrought as a thing that closes (squares of cubes)
obsessive desire to escape due to structure of the text, obsession always textual
textuality is obsidional: undecidable process of opening/closing‚Äîno letup (sans cesse)
already plunged by imperfect into already opened thickness of another text [chiasmatic invagination of borders?]
[re: Numbers] paragrammatical effects, cut w/in graphic substance retains/distorts traces of all sorts, small differences in repetition, imbedding
Sollers: column of penis, faeces, baby‚Äîsolid, each stimulate a membranous passage

text occupies place before ‚Äúme,‚Äù announces me to myself‚Äîune tour de guet (watchtower) planted inside me > like a ‚Äútransparent column,‚Äù pure outside: driven into that which tries to close in on itself > imagine you swallowed a cylindrical mirror, tower of Babel, bottomless plurality, not negative‚Ä¶also phallic [p. 342 in Zohar: ‚Äúgreat, ungraspable columns of air‚Äù]
column is nothing, no meaning in itself, a hollow phallus > guarantees innumerable passage of dissemination and playful displacement of margins
marching column, column of #s, mirror-column, column of air, column of mercury, column of gold
fire (black, white), transference from one text to another > consumption (relation btwn death & a certain sun) is textual like dissemination

like the crime, consumption/consummation of fire never takes place‚Äîthis is what the hymen names: 1) penetration, act perpetrated by what enters, consumes, sows confusion btwn partners 2) virginal screen that stands btwn desire/consummation, perpenetration/remembrance

contraction into a dot (point), to where everything is present but nothing exists, pleroma, Orphic explanation [?], ‚Äúdrama of God,‚Äù zimzum, God going out of himself takes place [can find this in Hegel] > repetition of absolute present or undifferentiated origin
atheism in Kabbalah, belief only in # [?] > Numbers a cabal/cabala where blanks only provisionally filled in
whiteness of virgin paper, blankness of transparent column, air > more than neutrality of some medium, uncovers space of play, play of space
apeiron (the boundless, the aorist, the imperfect)
before being milieu of work/production, as a breakthrough, air is ‚Äúair‚Äù: a ‚Äúquotation,‚Äù empty medium of text as generalized quotation
outside ‚Äúillusion‚Äù of originary presence, never anything but overdetermination
air as seeds
air as seeds
all these grafts, this is (est) that, this means that [forever]
empty square leaves way open for intersection of meanings, proliferates
moment of present meaning: their ‚Äúcontent‚Äù only surface effect into which you tombez sans cesse, fascin√©s by appearance
polysemy multiplies w/in horizon of final parousia, temporary detours of lived passion, a signifying martyrdom of truth past or truth to come [thus, dissemination not polysemy]
one must choose btwn the text & the theme
Numbers, as #s, have no meaning; p. 362 Numbers indecipherable, facade inscriptions
column has no being, belongs to no one

semantic order entangled in seminal, that which was never itself, never comes back to itself; semantic, as a moment of desire, signifies reappropriation of seed w/in presence > the seminal‚Äôs dream of death: seed wanting to keep itself

column is not, passage of dissemination, ‚Äúphallic‚Äù significance of column is a semic effect, reflection on 4th surface (described center, represented mastery of dissemination); ‚Äúis‚Äù‚Äîprocures calm, consciousness of ideal mastery > operation of 4th surface
‚Äúhorizon‚Äù-value (pure infinite opening for presentation of present and experience of meaning) is, suddenly, framed (encadr√©e)‚Äîit is a part, and suddenly parts (fait partie, la voici partie)
transformations of meaning hinge on certain squaring of text, obligatory passage through open surface, detour through empty square, around the column of fire
seminal dissemination w/out having been or coming back to itself, carried out at at loss, unto death
polysemy forgets its horizon is framed: difference btwn discursive polysemy and textual dissemination is difference itself
form, another name for presence
splayed square, triangle open on 4th side, loosens obsidionality of triangle and circle, whose ternary rhythm (Trinity, Oedipus, Dialectics) governs metaphysics
present indicative of ‚Äúto be‚Äù is the tense of the great parenthesis and of the 4th surface > which means its predominance is properly quartered (√©cartel√©e)
Heidegger‚Äôs Geviert, ‚Äúest‚Äù tried to say what is beyond narcissism, se prend (captured) in the mirror: Being confines itself to its rature (crossing-out) comme quadrature (criss-crossing)
can‚Äôt rest on copula, coupling is a mirror
Heidegger: ‚Äúradiantly, the ring joins the 4, everywhere open to the riddle of their presence‚Äù
discrete violence of incision not apparent in thickness of text [cf. EJQB p. 78]
to write means to graft (same word), each grafted text radiates toward the site of its removal, s‚Äôy r√©g√©n√®rent dans la r√©p√©tition, √† la bordure d‚Äôun surjet (overcast seam)

content: in scratching (gratter) on this textual matter, your recognize description of a painting, reframed, broken into, placed in another quadrilateral, w/ one side fractured: you are painting, writing while reading: tout le tissu verbal y est pris, et vous avec
thickness (l‚Äô√©paisseur) of text opens upon beyond of a whole, nothing or absolute outside: its depth (sa profondeur) at once null & infinite‚Äîeach layer (couche) harbors (en abrite) another
au bord (du vertige), alert to the border itself, infinite depths were also bottomless, perfectly superficial, cube w/out depth

Numbers undecipherable because numerable and innumerable: 1) something in the # surpasses mere # or cipher 2) everything in them is not ciphered (they‚Äôre innumerable), something that‚Äôs not anything > circle of the squaring
X not an unknown but chiasmus, a text that is unreadable because only readable > Numbers undecipherable because you imposed encryption on them by trying to decipher them
innumerable as force, blows up (or out of) all frames, & it works through it (taken into account) from the inside [Kant‚Äôs mathematical sublime?]
because innumerable beyond/short of what can be read by machine: excess & lack (defect)
relation to innumerable, absence of traces‚Äîunnameable, relation to my death
same w/ supernumerary (surnombre) (column of words): is part of the numeral and belongs (appartient) to very milieu it exceeds
each angle of square belongs to totality of surface, but multiplies it by folding back on itself, fractures it [the surface]‚Äîleaving room for supplementary attending (d‚Äôassistance) surface
no (trade) mark ever gets registered (se d√©pose) w/out certain lacking of names and #s, this lack provokes over-production, surplus value [then registering of mark?]
tracing not simply mere other or outside of erasing: can only trace itself out in in the erasure of its own ‚Äúpresence‚Äù
the unique (that which is not repeated‚Äîthus, has no unity), the inummerable, call it the present, is thus apeiron, the unlimited, the crowd, the imperfect
invisible column‚Äîundecidable, unmasterable in its height, uncontrollable in extension > unique & innumerable like what is called (the) present
only that which can be repeated in its identity can have unity
limits of square/cube‚Äîindefinitely specular unfolding/refolding: not limits at all > opening of its own inscription‚Äîtout autre, la m√™me, another geometry to come [EROS]
